original_text: And they shall bear the punishment of their iniquity: the punishment of the prophet shall be even as the punishment of him that seeketh unto him;
korean_text: 선지자의 죄악과 그에게 묻는 자의 죄악이 같은즉 각각 자기의 죄악을 담당하리니

sentences.original_text: And they shall bear the punishment of their iniquity
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 불의에 대한 형벌을 받을 것이다

sentences.original_text: shall be even as the punishment of him
